column4: Hi, Sometimes I find the text is garbled in chat lines. Any ideas how I can avoid this? Is it a problem of fonts?
Garbled how?
- for example the first few words are readable and the rest illegible and the final words O.K.?
Can you take a screenshot when it happens?
do you mean Past?
Can you upload it to some image sharing service?
- how would I do that? I tried copy and paste, but it doesn't work
Press the printscreen button on your keyboard, and then use something like imageshack to upload it
Which part?
I can go to file and then print, but after that ????
don't know what you mean upload it - how to do it or where to put it?
Not file and print.  Press the printscreen key on your keyboard, its usually next to F12
my keyboard doesn't have a print screen button
- arvind helped me find the screen shot so I can save. What do I do next please?
Give it whatever name you want
K3B should overwrite data on a dvd-rw when you go to write to it.
Sure
What do you mean by garbled?
Try #videolan ? I'm not sure if thats what you want though.
Its a trigger for ubottu, but that doesnt have any information you'd need.
En videolan I can't find any manual.
